articles.title: Microsoft blames Google for Apple rejecting offer to buy Bing - Search Engine Land
articles.description: Microsoft boss Mikhail Parakhin claims that despite offering more money than Google, the company was still turned down by Apple.
articles.content:
Microsoft claims its attempts to sell Bing to Apple were blocked by Google.
